reviews.text: Many tuition agencies, traditional Singapore food, workout classes. What is very unique about this mall is the old style, mosaic, doors, lift lobby, toilet and corridors. Very nostalgic.

These two Caucasian students were seen on a number of occasions preying on the female foreign domestics workers. They would wait for opportunities to sit next to them n then racking conversations with one or two of them.
Their motives are really questionable.

Sharing this new place that opened
Say Amos to get a discount if you are exploring their kids coaching programs

Not much agenda to be here other than if you are looking to helper employment for your home. There are a couple of reputable ones here from reviews - you can search them up through google but have not personally engaged with any of them directly.

A few small eateries are present as well, most possibly to accommodate to the tenants. Looks delicious nonetheless with reasonable pricing. Very traditional delicacies as well which brings back fond memories.

Other tuition centres, tailors, and massage parlors are also located here - mostly catered to the regulars living around the area.

Overall a good mall with good layout but of course not as commercialized. It serves its purpose at the end of the day.

Scam carpark. Charge is 1.95 SGD plus gst. Charge in block of 1 hour. Who the hell these days charge in block of 1 hour.
9 am to 11 15 am will set you back 6 plus dollar.
